# 5.0 Docs

- [Breaking change: Assembly-related API behavior changes for single-file publishing format](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/5.0/assembly-api-behavior-changes-for-single-file-publish.md): Learn about the .NET 5 breaking change in core .NET libraries where multiple APIs related to an assembly's file location have behavior changes when they're invoked in a single-file publishing format.
- [Breaking change: Most code access security APIs are obsolete](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/5.0/code-access-security-apis-obsolete.md): Learn about the .NET 5 breaking change in core .NET libraries where most code access security (CAS)-related types in .NET are now obsolete as warning.
- [Breaking change: CreateCounterSetInstance throws InvalidOperationException if instance already exists](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/5.0/createcountersetinstance-throws-invalidoperation.md): Learn about the .NET 5 breaking change in core .NET libraries where CounterSet.CreateCounterSetInstance throws a different exception if the counter already exists.
- [Breaking change: Default ActivityIdFormat is W3C](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/5.0/default-activityidformat-changed.md): Learn about the .NET 5 breaking change in core .NET libraries where the default ActivityIdFormat is now W3C.
- [Breaking change: Environment.OSVersion returns the correct operating system version](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/5.0/environment-osversion-returns-correct-version.md): Learn about the .NET 5 breaking change in core .NET libraries where Environment.OSVersion returns the actual version of the operating system instead of, for example, the OS that's selected for application compatibility.
- [Breaking change: FrameworkDescription's value is .NET instead of .NET Core](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/5.0/frameworkdescription-returns-net-not-net-core.md): Learn about the .NET 5 breaking change in core .NET libraries where RuntimeInformation.FrameworkDescription now returns ".NET" instead of ".NET Core".
- [Breaking change: Global assembly cache APIs are obsolete](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/5.0/global-assembly-cache-apis-obsolete.md): Learn about the .NET 5 breaking change in core .NET libraries where APIs that deal with the GAC either fail or perform no operation.
- [Breaking change: Hardware intrinsic IsSupported checks may differ for nested types](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/5.0/hardware-instrinsics-issupported-checks.md): Learn about the .NET 5 breaking change in core .NET libraries where checking X64.IsSupported for hardware intrinsics may now produce a different result.
- [Breaking change: IntPtr and UIntPtr implement IFormattable](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/5.0/intptr-uintptr-implement-iformattable.md): Learn about the .NET 5 breaking change in core .NET libraries where IntPtr and UIntPtr now implement IFormattable.
- [Breaking change: LastIndexOf has improved handling of empty search strings](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/5.0/lastindexof-improved-handling-of-empty-values.md): Learn about the .NET 5 breaking change in core .NET libraries where LastIndexOf and related APIs now return correct values when searching for a zero-length substring.
- [Breaking change: URI paths with non-ASCII characters parse correctly on Unix](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/5.0/non-ascii-chars-in-uri-parsed-correctly.md): Learn about the .NET 5 breaking change in core .NET libraries where absolute URI paths that contain non-ASCII characters now parse correctly on Unix platforms.
- [Breaking change: .NET 5 API obsoletions with non-default diagnostic IDs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/5.0/obsolete-apis-with-custom-diagnostics.md): Learn about the .NET 5 breaking change in core .NET libraries where some APIs have been marked as obsolete with a custom diagnostic ID.
- [Breaking change: Obsolete properties on ConsoleLoggerOptions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/5.0/obsolete-consoleloggeroptions-properties.md): Learn about the .NET 5 breaking change in core .NET libraries where the ConsoleLoggerFormat type and some properties on ConsoleLoggerOptions are now obsolete.
- [Breaking change: Complexity of LINQ OrderBy.First{OrDefault} increased](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/5.0/orderby-firstordefault-complexity-increase.md): Learn about the .NET 5 breaking change in core .NET libraries where the implementation of OrderBy.First has changed.
- [Breaking change: OSPlatform attributes renamed or removed](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/5.0/os-platform-attributes-renamed.md): Learn about the .NET 5 breaking change in core .NET libraries where OS platform attributes that were introduced in a preview version have been removed or renamed.
- [Breaking change: Microsoft.DotNet.PlatformAbstractions package removed](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/5.0/platformabstractions-package-removed.md): Learn about the .NET 5 breaking change in core .NET libraries where the Microsoft.DotNet.PlatformAbstractions package has been removed.
- [Breaking change: PrincipalPermissionAttribute is obsolete as error](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/5.0/principalpermissionattribute-obsolete.md): Learn about the .NET 5 breaking change in core .NET libraries where the PrincipalPermissionAttribute constructor is obsolete and produces a compile-time error.
- [Breaking change: Parameter names changed in RC2](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/5.0/reference-assembly-parameter-names-rc1.md): Learn about the .NET 5 breaking change in core .NET libraries where some reference assembly parameter names have changed from preview and release-candidate versions of .NET 5.0.
- [Breaking change: Parameter names changed in reference assemblies](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/5.0/reference-assembly-parameter-names.md): Learn about the .NET 5 breaking change in core .NET libraries where some reference assembly parameter names have changed to match parameter names in the implementation assemblies.
- [Breaking change: Remoting APIs are obsolete](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/5.0/remoting-apis-obsolete.md): Learn about the .NET 5 breaking change in core .NET libraries where some remoting-related APIs are marked as obsolete and generate a warning with a custom diagnostic ID.
- [Breaking change: Order of tags in Activity.Tags is reversed](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/5.0/reverse-order-of-tags-in-activity-property.md): Learn about the .NET 5 breaking change in core .NET libraries where Activity.Tags now stores items in the list according to the order they're added.
- [Breaking change: SSE and SSE2 CompareGreaterThan methods properly handle NaN inputs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/5.0/sse-comparegreaterthan-intrinsics.md): Learn about the .NET 5 breaking change in core .NET libraries where SSE and SSE2 comparison methods have been fixed to properly handle NaN inputs.
- [Breaking change: Thread.Abort is obsolete](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/5.0/thread-abort-obsolete.md): Learn about the .NET 5 breaking change in core .NET libraries where the Thread.Abort APIs are obsolete.
- [Breaking change: Uri recognition of UNC paths on Unix](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/5.0/unc-path-recognition-unix.md): Learn about the .NET 5 breaking change in core .NET libraries where the Uri class now recognizes strings that start with two forward slashes as UNC paths on Unix.
- [Breaking change: UTF-7 code paths are obsolete](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/5.0/utf-7-code-paths-obsolete.md): Learn about the .NET 5 breaking change in core .NET libraries where the UTF7 and UTF7Encoding constructors are obsolete.
- [Breaking change: Behavior change for Vector2.Lerp and Vector4.Lerp](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/5.0/vector-lerp-behavior-change.md): Learn about the .NET 5 breaking change in core .NET libraries where the implementation of Vector2.Lerp and Vector4.Lerp changed to correctly account for a floating-point rounding error.
- [Breaking change: Vector<T> throws NotSupportedException](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/5.0/vectort-throws-notsupportedexception.md): Learn about the .NET 5 breaking change in core .NET libraries where Vector<T> always throws an exception for unsupported type parameters.
